column1: Master of Science in Information and Technology Management
column5: Improve your career advancement and earning potential as an IT professionalThe University of Tampa's Master of Science in Information and Technology Management, a STEM approved program, is designed for IT professionals who want to develop both their technical expertise and managerial skills to advance their career. Students can customize the degree to meet their goals and is ideal for mid-career professionals as well as younger employees seeking accelerated career growth.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
